sentences.en: He stood for an hour, powerless to turn away.
sentences.cn: 他站在那里达一小时之久, 无法离开.

sentences.en: He was sympathetic, but powerless to help.
sentences.cn: 他表示同情，但爱莫能助。

sentences.en: His feeble arm dropped powerless down.
sentences.cn: 他那软弱的胳臂没力气地放了下来.

sentences.en: I was powerless to prevent the accident.
sentences.cn: 我无力阻止事故的发生.

sentences.en: If he took control, they would be rendered virtually powerless.
sentences.cn: 如果由他来掌管, 他们实际上就会丧失所有的权力.

sentences.en: Libraries are powerless to relinquish them.
sentences.cn: 图书馆却无法弃而不用.

sentences.en: People are being murdered every day and I am powerless to stop it.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人被杀，而我却无力阻止。

sentences.en: See how powerless is the human will against predestination!
sentences.cn: 请看人类反抗命运的意志是多么脆弱无力啊!

sentences.en: That will leave thee powerless even to repent?
sentences.cn: —它已经折磨得你甚至无力去悔改了!

sentences.en: The insect is powerless to move while the spider eats it alive.
sentences.cn: 昆虫无法动弹,这时蜘蛛便把它活活吃掉.

sentences.en: They feel scared and powerless in conveyor-belt hospital wards.
sentences.cn: 在千篇一律的病房里，他们感到恐惧而又无能为力。

sentences.en: They said something that words were powerless to utter.
sentences.cn: 他们诉说着一件语言无力表达的事.

sentences.en: Those who protested against the president's decision were actually barking at the moon , since they were in a powerless minority.
sentences.cn: 由于他们属于软弱无力的少数,他们反对总统的决定实际上枉费唇舌.

sentences.en: When the enemy attacked, we were completely powerless against them.
sentences.cn: 敌人进攻的时候，我们毫无抵御能力。

words.tran_cn: 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的
有动力装置的；以…为动力的
功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂
促进（power的过去分词）；给…提供动力
激励；供以动力；使…有力量

trans.tran_cn: 无力的，无能的，无权力的，虚弱的，无资源的
trans.tran_en: unable to stop or control something because you do not have the power, strength, or legal right to do so
